title: Opening Inaccuracies Tool Released
description: A new analysis tool that imports your games and identifies recurring opening inaccuracies, helping you uncover repeated patterns that quietly hold back long-term improvement.

title: Using Maia to Find Repertoire Gaps
description: An exploration of how Maia can be used to uncover gaps in your opening repertoire by comparing your move choices against expected human decision-making patterns.

title: Integrating Maia2 into My Chess Application
description: A technical overview of what Maia2 is, why it matters for practical chess training, and how it was integrated into my application as an analysis engine.
